name: sample packaging
description: A step involving the packaging of samples for transport or storage.

name: freeze drying
description: A step involving the removal of moisture from samples by sublimation.

name: labelling
description: A step involving the application of labels to organisms, samples or containers.

name: scan qrcode
description: A step involving the scanning of a QR code for identification or tracking purposes.

name: photographing
description: A step involving the capture of images of organisms, samples or containers.

name: geotagging
description: A step involving the recording of geographical coordinates for samples or organisms.

name: store sample
description: A step involving the storage of a sample in a sample container.

name: storage
description: A step involving the storage of samples or organisms in a controlled environment.

name: weighing
description: A step involving the measurement of the weight of samples or organisms.

name: aliquoting
description: A step involving the division of a sample into smaller portions for analysis or storage.

name: sampling
description: A step involving the collection of samples from organisms or environments.

name: printing
description: A step involving the printing of labels or documents related to samples or organisms.

name: cleaning
description: A step involving the removal of contaminants or impurities from tools, samples or organisms.
